page.title: 13A Week in My Life
page.content:
SUNDAY MAY 26th.
I watched a video tape on our video. Then I had cornflakes for breakfast. hen I went for a ride on my bike.At 12.16pm we went to Longleat Safari Park.The animals run free so we had to stay in the car and drive around.Then we went to Bath and walked around.We ha roast chicken for tea and then I went to bed.
MONDAY MAY 26th
I had cornflakes for breakfast.Then we went to a carboot sale in Marlborough. Then we went to a jumble sale in Cirencester.On the way back home we went to The Happy Eater restaurant.I did a jigsaw puzzle with Mum.Then we had fish for tea.
